Reviews.Title: works great, priced great!
Reviews.Author: Archie Robinson Jr. "Solarrdadd"
Reviews.Content: i received the phone from the seller in perfect NEW condition.  It is being used as a replacement for my older phone of the same type.  I installed the sym card from my old phone transferred it into the new phone, put in my micro sdhc card and turned it on, set it up and it works like a charm.  got it at a great price and i couldn't be happier.  it's a great phone if you need this type of device and i highly recommend the seller to buy it from.  i got great service from them.the biggest need for me on this phone is the direct connect feature.  i use this for work email, cell and direct connect.  i do at times use it for searching the web since wi-fi is built into the phone.  also having all my contacts and info backed up on the computer made transferring all my data and settings a snap.  the phone also came with the latest blackberry OS/firmware available which makes me feel better.

Reviews.Title: So good
Reviews.Author: FILIPE
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product, very beautiful and functional. met the expectation of purchase. I am looking for others like.

Reviews.Title: nextel
Reviews.Author: HELIO GODOY
Reviews.Content: For the Brazil is a mobile phone good because it is a mobile simple in this function and I used a lot

Reviews.Title: OMG!
Reviews.Author: Miggy447
Reviews.Content: Best Phone I've EVER had! It shouldn't even be considered a phone, it should be considered a MINI computer or something in that case. This phone can do so much. NO JOKE! You can listen to crystal clear music, go on the internet, download apps with cool features, walkie-talkie, watch and record videos, it's just endless what you can do with this phone! You have to get one!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: Good design, size and weight.  I can use this unit in Peru, with the local provider, without problems and contact.

Reviews.Title: Not usable for me
Reviews.Author: Glenn Galvin
Reviews.Content: Sprint was unable to hook up this phone to their network so it was of no use to me. Too bad because my old one worked just fine

Reviews.Title: refurbished
Reviews.Author: Marcio
Reviews.Content: Does not work properly...The radio button fails every time..It comes without the stock hard case...It is a refurbished devicekeep away
